children.subject: I'll be sure to do that. Ive heard a lot of great reviews about the stat134 adjunct in particular. Cheers!
tips: enroll in SLC’s adjunct and you’ll be good as long as you are willing to keep up with the course.
Totally agree with the followup above. I took the adjunct and did all the problems on Mike's worksheets and got an easy A.

history.content:
Hello, I was wondering if anyone here could shed light on the difficulty/workload of Stat 134. Some of my questions:

How difficult would you say the class is? What do you think students struggle the most with in the class? Any tips for succeeding? How many hours per week would you say an average/slightly-below average student should expect to put in the class?

Obviously the higher the better, but I would be very happy with a B or B+. Besides an A in data8, I don't have much experience in stats.

PS: I'll be taking stat 134 with only one other tech (CS w186)

Thanks so much!
history.subject: Stat 134 workload?
